text: The 2017 Pan American Men's Youth Handball Championship the XIII edition of this tournament took place in Santiago, Chile from 15 to 22 April 2017. It acts as a qualifying tournament for the 2017 Men's Youth World Handball Championship. ==Participating teams== * * * * * * * * * * * ==Referees== Following six referee pairs were selected by the
